pageContext.claim: “Senate Democrats even blocked legislation that would give medical care to babies who survive attempted abortions.”
pageContext.analysis: That's not what the bill would have done. It would have punished any doctor who failed to provide medical care to a child born alive after an attempted abortion. Opponents of the bill argued that it represented an unjustified attack on abortion rights, preventing doctors from exercising their best medical judgment and exposing them to possible lawsuits or prosecution.
